Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/105th
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 107th, Cottage Grove, 103rd and King Drive: due to, police activity  near King Drive/105th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 107th, Cottage Grove, 103rd and King Drive: due to, police activity  near King Drive/105th.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Division
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Chicago due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Chicago due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
